body:
Syntax: cast 'heal' <target>

Heal is a powerful restorative spell that fully restores the target's hit 
points to maximum. This spell is invaluable in combat and exploration,
capable of bringing even critically wounded characters back to full health.

Classes: Cleric
Level: 16
Mana Cost: 40
Position: Standing or Fighting

Heal can be cast on yourself or others. It is one of the most important
spells for keeping your party alive during dangerous encounters.

See Also: CURE LIGHT, CURE CRITIC, GROUP HEAL
